name: No More Monkeys
description:
At night, sock monkeys come to life and try to take your toys! Jump around your beds and bop them on their heads! After landing on a head, steer in the direction that you want to go, and they'll be kicked the opposite way.

Controls

Move - WASD or left analog on XBOX 360

Confirm - spacebar

Credits

Programming: Benjamin Hanken

Music & SFX: Nigel Stadick

Art: Pete Soloway
